Description: Red painted wooden model of a vase; hole in the base for a tenon; part of a model group. According to Zitman (2010, 235 (II)) it goes with model EA45164.
Bibliographic references: Zitman 2010 / The necropolis of Assiut: a case study of local Egyptian funerary culture from the Old Kingdom to the end of the Middle Kingdom (II, 235)
Acquisition name: Donated by: Dr David George Hogarth
